descriptionList: Developed and maintained web applications using Vue and Nuxt.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams on product design.
Implemented CI/CD pipelines for deployment automation.
Built responsive user interfaces with React and Tailwind.
Improved frontend performance by optimizing bundle sizes.
Worked closely with UX designers to refine user experience.
Contributed to building a cross-platform mobile app.
Wrote unit tests and participated in code reviews.
Learned Agile development processes and tools.
